resources.string: Failed to download new version, please try again later.
Update the app with new version.%1$s
\n\n * If you do not update, you cannot use the app.
Please allow to install app from this source.%1$s
Downloading new version of kotlin cheat sheet app.
Fetching new cheatsheets list from github.
Fetching new points list from github.
There are no Cheatsheets available in the database.
Failed to Save points on the database.

"Using the tips in this section, you will achieve complete mastery of Kotlin syntax. When you start using this section, all the tips are taken from GitHub repository and stored in your phone's database, and in your next uses, the tips are taken from the database. If new tips are created or existing tips are modified, the app will retrieve the new tips from GitHub repository and replace the previous ones. "
"Using the tips in this section, you will master Kotlin coroutines. To clearly understand the concepts in this section, all the use cases of Kotlin coroutines and flows are visualized."
coming soon in the next version !!!
